title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Improving Learner Satisfaction in Blended and Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: No online/blended learning experience, basic understanding of social issues
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three effective time management strategies in blended learning environments.
Learners can perform role division and collaboration processes in PBL-based social problem-solving projects with 80% accuracy.
Learners can diagnose issues arising from the use of online learning tools (mobile-centric) and propose improvement measures.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
